attributes.review: I wanted to download this app so I could keep an eye on Donald Trump news as well as things his administration was doing. But immediately upon opening the app it forced me to enter a mobile phone number, so that I would get notifications about his rally‚Äôs, polls, and things like that. I did not want to put my phone number in, but the app used a code verification number so there is no escaping it. Within the first minute I realized this app is no good, do not download.
attributes.title: This app is too pushy

attributes.review: Hello, I was so happy to get this app so i can get more educated on how to make america ‚Äúgreat again‚Äù and how to stand with my great and wonderful üçäorange üçä president ‚ò∫Ô∏è but it took several weeks to download and i was starting to get mad and it finally downloaded,, so i go into the app and it says to put in my phone number which.. is no problem BUT when i put in my phone number it told me to put in the verification code BUT I NEVER GOT THE CODE!1!!1!1 ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ i am so mad and frustrated by our presidents coding system the fact that i cant get ‚ú®educated ‚ú® is making me furious!!!!!!!! And it was so hard to navigate to see whats on my screen but there so much text!!!! I do not and will never recommend this app,, i used to support the trump2020 (on a grave) but now i dont know how to feel about it its gotten me mad i have no idea what to do so if our president would fix the app that would be great bur i do not think he will because he does not care about his citizens satisfaction because i WAS NOT SATISFIED AT ALL!!!!!! . I hope this orange thing gets thrown 6 feet under. I love my president tho üåöüåù anyway WORST APP EVER DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
